title: Print, "The Drive in Central Park, New York, from Harper's Weekly, September 1860, pp. 584-585.", September 15, 1860
medium: Wood engraving in black ink on newsprint paper.
signed: Signed on the block, lower right: W. Homer.
description: Horizontal view of an outdoor scene, with several open horse-and-carriages, as well as men and women on horseback.

tombstone.epitaph:
Print, "The Drive in Central Park, New York, from Harper's Weekly, September 1860, pp. 584-585.", September 15, 1860.
September 15, 1860. Wood engraving in black ink on newsprint paper.. Gift of Arthur B. Carlson. 1951-93-1.
